tags.name: Admin
tags.description: These endpoints are used by the admin to manage and interact with the system

tags.name: User
tags.description: These endpoints are used by the user to interact with the system

tags.name: Transaction Microservice
tags.description: These endpoints are used by the transaction microservice to interact with the wallet system

post.summary: Admin Creates a new wallet type
post.description: Create a new wallet type, the system authenticates against admin api key
Admin Update Wallet Type Restriction, the system authenticates against the admin API Key
Admin Update Wallet Type, the system authenticates against the admin API Key
Admin creates a new wallet tier for a specific wallet type ,the system authenticates against the admin API Key
User create a new Wallet Profile ,the system authenticates against the users certificate and API Key

get.description: Gets user wallet profiles(s) ,the system authenticates against admin api key if the request is coming from the admin and against the user api-key if the request is coming from the user
Gets users wallet profiles(s) ,the system authenticates against admin api key if the request is coming from the admin and against the user api-key if the request is coming from the user

post.description: Admin update tier ,the system authenticates against the admin api key

get.description: Gets all wallet types ,the system authenticates against admin api key
Gets all tiers ,the system authenticates against admin api key
Gets a specific tier ,the system authenticates against admin api key
Admin get a specific wallet type including its tiers ,the system authenticates against admin api key

post.summary: Admin adds or removes wallet type tier
post.description: Adds or removes wallet type tier, the system authenticates against admin api key

post.summary: Admin Update User Wallet Profile Tier
post.description: Admin update user wallet profile tier ,the system authenticates against admin api key and also the users certificate
User creates subwallets attached to thier wallet Profiles if the users wallet type supports subwallets, the system authenticates against the users certificate and api key
User update subwallet attached to their wallet profile, the system authenticates the user against the users api key and certificate
User allocate allowance to subwallets attached to their wallet profile, the system authenticates the user against the users api key and certificate

get.description: Get Subwallets Info, the system authenticates against the users api key
Get All User Wallet Profiles, the system authenticates against the users certificate and api key

post.description: User Sets Transaction Pin, the system authenticates against the users certificate and api key
User Changes Transaction Pin, the system authenticates against the users certificate and api key
User Resets Transaction Pin, the system authenticates against the users certificate and api key
create-financial-institution

Links a financial institution to a  users wallet profile, the system authenticates the user api key and certificate
Unlinks a financial institution from a  users wallet profile, the system authenticates the user api key and certificate
Deactivates a financial institution, the system authenticates the admin api key and certificate
Activates a financial institution, the system authenticates the admin api key and certificate

get.description: Gets a linked financial institution, the system authenticates the user api key and certificate
Gets all financial institutions, the system authenticates the admin api key
Gets a financial institution, the system authenticates the user api key and certificate
